alert.note: Alert for East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued December 23 at 3:49PM PST until December 25 at 6:00AM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE FRIDAY NIGHT... ...WINTER STORM WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible with total snow accumulations of 12 to 18 inches possible. * WHERE...East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades. * WHEN...From Friday morning through late Friday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. This may impact traffic along Highways 20 and 26.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: East Slopes of the Oregon Cascades
